calc_vol_and_surface — Calculation of Volume and Surface¶

This module provides direct coupling analysis operations.

Module Syntax¶

Empty.

Module Contents¶

calc_vol_and_surface.check_indices(indices, box, raise_error)¶

Docstring missing.

calc_vol_and_surface.process_vol(energy_box, vdw_box, energy_cutoff, result_dict, raise_error, vdw_type)¶

This function is not well designed.

Parameters:
  • probability_box – DXBox contains the energies.
  • vdw_box – flooded VDWBox.
  • energy_cutoff – count grid points with an energy < limit
  • result_dict – dictionary
Returns:

updated dictionary
calc_vol_and_surface.process_surface(energy_box, surface_index, energy_cutoff, result_dict, vdw_type)¶

Docstring missing.

calc_vol_and_surface.calc_vol_and_surface(pdb_path, energy_cutoff, zipped=True, result_path="result_data.txt", energy_box=None, counter_box=None, raise_error=True, conc=1.)¶
Parameters:
  • pdb_path – path to the pdb file
  • energy_cutoff – positive float
  • zipped – are the matrices gzipped or not? Default is True.
  • result_path – path to which the results are to be written.
Returns:

a dictionary with following keys:

  • ‘total_volume’
  • ‘fav_volume’
  • ‘unfav_volume’
  • ‘neutral_volume’
  • ‘total_surface’
  • ‘fav_surface’
  • ‘unfav_surface’
  • ‘neutral_surface’
